name: Từ vựng Tiếng Anh các loại phương tiện giao thông (Types of Transportation)

words.example: The airplane took off smoothly from the runway.
She rides her bicycle to work every day.
We took a small boat out on the lake.
I missed the bus this morning and had to walk.
He bought a new car last month.
We traveled by coach from London to Edinburgh.
A helicopter rescued the climbers from the mountain.
He enjoys riding his motorcycle on weekends.
The cargo ship sailed across the ocean.
Let's take a taxi to the airport to catch our flight.
The train arrived at the station on time.
We took the tram to explore the city center.
The subway is a fast way to travel in the city.
The delivery driver uses a large van for packages.
